error.title: Something went wrong

editor.loadNodeTypeFailed: Failed to load node type info
editor.noExtraConfig: No additional configuration options for this node type
editor.nodeTypeUnavailableDesc: Cannot load configuration options for node type "{{type}}". You can still edit the node name.

editor.noOutputDefDesc: This node type has no defined output structure, or node info has not loaded yet.
editor.pinnedDataDesc: This node has pinned test data. Pinned data will be used preferentially during execution.

optimizer.title: AI Flow Optimization
optimizer.description: Use AI to analyze flow structure, identify parallelizable nodes, mergeable requests, and execution order optimizations.
optimizer.poweredBy: Powered by Phi-3-Mini local AI model
optimizer.aiThinking: AI is thinking about optimization suggestions
optimizer.analyzeFailed: Unable to connect to optimization service
optimizer.flowIsOptimal: No optimizations found, your flow structure is good!

execution.title: Execution History
execution.clickToStart: Click the button below to start this flow
execution.notFoundDesc: This execution may have been deleted or does not exist
execution.resumeConfirm: Are you sure you want to resume this execution?
execution.pauseConfirm: Are you sure you want to pause this running execution?

service.title: External Services
service.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this service?
service.deleteConfirmDesc: Flows using this service may not work properly after deletion.
service.identifierPattern: Only lowercase letters, numbers and hyphens allowed, must start with a letter
service.identifierTooltip: Unique name for internal system identification
service.baseUrlTooltip: Base URL of the service, e.g., http://localhost:8080
service.schemaUrlTooltip: If the service has an OpenAPI document, the system will automatically parse API endpoints
service.saveBeforeTest: Please save the service before testing connection
service.securityTipDesc: Select saved credentials. The platform will automatically decrypt and inject credentials when calling external services. Credentials are stored with AES-256 encryption.
service.selectCredentialTooltip: Select an existing credential or create a new one
service.manualAuthDesc: If you don't want to use saved credentials, you can manually configure authentication here. Note: Manual settings are not encrypted.
service.authConfigTooltip: Configure authentication based on the auth type
service.descriptionPlaceholder: Describe the purpose of this service
service.deleteEndpointConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this endpoint?
service.endpointDescPlaceholder: Describe the purpose of this endpoint

credential.title: Credentials
credential.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this credential?
credential.deleteConfirmDesc: This action cannot be undone. Services using this credential may not work properly.
credential.testNotSupported: This credential type does not support connection testing
credential.securityInfo: Credentials are stored with AES-256 encryption. The platform automatically decrypts and injects credentials when calling external services. Keep your credentials safe and do not share with untrusted people.
credential.descriptionPlaceholder: Optional, describe the purpose of this credential
credential.visibilitySharedDesc: Shared - Can be shared with specific users
credential.securityTipDesc: Your credentials will be stored with AES-256 encryption and only decrypted during flow execution.

component.title: Components
component.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this component?
component.componentNamePattern: Only lowercase letters, numbers and hyphens allowed, must start with a letter
component.statusWarning: Status can only be set to active or deprecated
component.noVersionsDesc: Please add a version to enable this component
component.versionFormatError: Version number format error, recommend using semantic versioning like 1.0.0
component.versionFormatHint: Recommend using semantic version numbers, e.g., 1.0.0, 2.1.0

ai.title: AI Settings
ai.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this AI config?
ai.apiKeyKept: API Key is set. Leave empty to keep current.
ai.temperatureTooltip: Controls randomness of responses. Lower values produce more deterministic responses, higher values produce more diverse responses.

settingsInfoList.providers: Supports multiple AI providers: Claude, ChatGPT, Gemini, Ollama

settingsInfoList.ollamaLocal: Ollama runs locally and doesn't require an API Key

device.title: Device Management
device.subtitle: Manage connected Agents or add a new Agent to your computer
device.blockConfirmDesc: Once blocked, this Agent will not be able to connect to the platform

device.runCommandInTerminal: Run the following command in your terminal:
device.installCompleteHint: After installation, the Agent will automatically connect to the platform. Refresh this page to check the status.

gateway.title: Gateway Settings
gateway.description: Configure the Agent Gateway domain and port. Agents will use these settings to connect to the platform.
gateway.restartWarning: Note: Service restart required after changes
gateway.restartWarningDesc: After changing Gateway settings, you need to restart the N3N service to apply the new configuration. Existing Agent connections will be disconnected and reconnected after the service restarts.
gateway.domainRequired: Please enter a domain or IP address
gateway.domainHelp: Agents will use this domain to connect to the Gateway. Can be a domain name or IP address.
gateway.portHelp: Port used for Agent WebSocket connections. Default is 9443.
gateway.enableHelp: When disabled, new Agent connections will be rejected.

flowGenerator.title: Natural Language Flow Generator
flowGenerator.description: Describe the workflow you want to create in plain language, and AI will generate the corresponding nodes and connections.
flowGenerator.placeholder: e.g., Check Gmail for new emails every morning at 9 AM, and if there are any, send a notification to Slack #general channel...
flowGenerator.tipDesc: The more detailed your description, the more accurate the generated flow will be. You can mention timing, conditions, services to connect, etc.
flowGenerator.feedbackPlaceholder: This is not what I want, I want... (optional feedback)
flowGenerator.missingNodesDesc: The following node types are not installed. Click "Install All" to install them automatically:

ai.label: AI
ai.description: AI chat, agents, memory and vector search

messaging.description: Instant messaging and social platform integration

social.label: Social Media

errorTrigger.description: Triggered when another flow encounters an error

aiChat.label: AI Chat
aiChat.description: Chat with AI models, supports OpenAI, Claude, Gemini, Ollama

aiAgent.label: AI Agent
aiAgent.description: Intelligent agent that can automatically use tools to complete tasks (ReAct mode)

aiChain.label: AI Chain
aiChain.description: RAG, Map-Reduce, summary and other AI processing pipelines

aiMemory.label: AI Memory
aiMemory.description: Manage conversation memory, supports storage, retrieval and summarization

aiVectorSearch.label: Vector Search
aiVectorSearch.description: Vector similarity search for semantic retrieval

aiRag.label: RAG Q&A
aiRag.description: Document Q&A system based on retrieval-augmented generation

aiConversation.label: Conversation Chain
aiConversation.description: Multi-turn conversation processing chain with memory

aiRouter.label: AI Router
aiRouter.description: Intelligently route to different processing branches based on input content

aiSequence.label: Sequential Chain
aiSequence.description: Execute multiple AI processing steps in sequence

aiVectorStore.label: Vector Store
aiVectorStore.description: Manage vector database indexing and storage

aiDocLoader.label: Document Loader
aiDocLoader.description: Load PDF, text, web page and other documents

aiTextSplitter.label: Text Splitter
aiTextSplitter.description: Split long documents into smaller chunks

aiSummarize.label: AI Summarize
aiSummarize.description: Automatically generate document or conversation summaries

stopAndError.label: Stop And Error
stopAndError.description: Stop execution and throw an error

aiTransform.label: AI Transform
aiTransform.description: Describe data transformation logic in natural language, AI auto-generates and executes code

externalService.label: External Service
externalService.description: Call registered external services via OpenAPI

json.label: JSON
json.description: JSON parse, serialize, query and transform

text.label: Text
text.description: Text split, replace, case conversion and more

regex.description: Regular expression match, extract and replace

redis.description: Redis key-value, list, hash, set operations

elasticsearch.description: Elasticsearch full-text search and index management

telegram.label: Telegram
telegram.description: Send Telegram messages, stickers and files

slack.label: Slack
slack.description: Send Slack messages and upload files

facebook.label: Facebook
facebook.description: Facebook page management and content publishing

instagram.label: Instagram
instagram.description: Instagram content publishing and account management

gmail.label: Gmail
gmail.description: Gmail email search, read and send

googleSheets.label: Google Sheets
googleSheets.description: Read, write and append Google Sheets

googlePubSub.label: Google Cloud Pub/Sub
googlePubSub.description: Google Cloud Pub/Sub message publish and subscribe

browser.label: Browser Automation
browser.description: Automate browser operations via Chrome DevTools Protocol

approval.label: Wait for Approval
approval.description: Pause flow and wait for approval

retry.label: Retry
retry.description: Auto-retry on failure with exponential backoff support

rateLimiter.label: Rate Limiter
rateLimiter.description: Control flow throughput rate to prevent overload

itemLists.label: Item Lists
itemLists.description: Advanced list operations: concatenate, chunk, flatten, group, etc.

spreadsheet.label: Spreadsheet / CSV
spreadsheet.description: Parse and generate CSV, convert between JSON and spreadsheet formats

executeCommand.label: Execute Command
executeCommand.description: Execute system commands and get output

createBasicFlow.label: Create Basic Flow
createBasicFlow.description: Create a new automation flow from scratch
createBasicFlow.prompt: Please help me create a new automation flow.

createScheduleTask.label: Create Schedule Task
createScheduleTask.prompt: Please help me create a scheduled task that runs daily.

createWebhookHandler.label: Create Webhook Handler
createWebhookHandler.description: Create a flow to receive external Webhook requests
createWebhookHandler.prompt: Please help me create a Webhook receiver that processes incoming requests.

createDataSync.label: Create Data Sync
createDataSync.description: Create a data synchronization flow between sources
createDataSync.prompt: Please help me create a data sync flow that reads from a source and writes to a target.

createNotification.label: Create Notification Flow
createNotification.prompt: Please help me create a notification flow that sends alerts when specific events occur.

optimizePerformance.label: Optimize Performance
optimizePerformance.description: Analyze and optimize flow execution performance
optimizePerformance.prompt: Please analyze performance bottlenecks in this flow and suggest optimizations.

addErrorHandling.label: Add Error Handling
addErrorHandling.description: Add comprehensive error handling to the flow
addErrorHandling.prompt: Please add comprehensive error handling to this flow, including retry mechanisms and alert notifications.

addLogging.label: Add Logging
addLogging.description: Add detailed logging to the flow
addLogging.prompt: Please add logging at key steps in this flow for tracking and debugging.

parallelize.label: Parallelize Processing
parallelize.description: Convert parallelizable steps to run concurrently
parallelize.prompt: Please analyze which steps in this flow can run in parallel and suggest optimizations.

explainFlow.label: Explain Flow
explainFlow.description: Explain each step of the flow in detail
explainFlow.prompt: Please explain how this flow works in detail, including each node's purpose and data flow.

findIssues.label: Find Issues
findIssues.description: Find potential issues in the flow
findIssues.prompt: Please check this flow for potential issues, including errors, performance problems or design issues.

suggestImprovements.label: Suggest Improvements
suggestImprovements.prompt: Please analyze this flow and provide improvement suggestions to make it more efficient and reliable.

debugError.label: Debug Error
debugError.description: Help find and fix flow errors
debugError.prompt: This flow encountered an error during execution. Please analyze possible causes and provide fix suggestions.

traceData.label: Trace Data Flow
traceData.description: Trace data propagation through the flow
traceData.prompt: Please help me trace data propagation in this flow and identify where data may be lost or transformed.

templateMonitor.label: API Monitor Template
templateMonitor.description: Create an API health check and alert flow
templateMonitor.prompt: Please help me create an API monitoring flow that checks API status every 5 minutes and sends alerts if abnormal.

templateEtl.label: ETL Processing Template
templateEtl.description: Create an Extract, Transform, Load flow
templateEtl.prompt: Please help me create an ETL flow that extracts data from a source, transforms it, then loads it into a target database.

templateAiPipeline.label: AI Processing Pipeline
templateAiPipeline.description: Create a flow with AI processing
templateAiPipeline.prompt: Please help me create a flow with AI processing that can automatically process and analyze data.

promptTemplates.createFlow: Please help me create a {description} flow
promptTemplates.readTransformStore: Read data from {source}, transform and store in {target}
